law.catch_line: Except as otherwise provided in this section:...

text.section:
Except as otherwise provided in this section:
A lender or arranger of financing for a reverse mortgage loan insured under 12 U.S.C. § 1715z-20 that violates this subtitle is subject to the penalties provided in 12 U.S.C. § 1715z-20, and in any regulations and guidance adopted under 12 U.S.C. § 1715z-20; and
A lender or arranger of financing for a reverse mortgage loan not insured under 12 U.S.C. § 1715z-20 that violates this subtitle:
Engages in an unfair or deceptive trade practice within the meaning of Title 13 of this article; and
Is subject to the enforcement and penalty provisions contained in Title 13 of this article, except § 13-411.
A violation of this subtitle does not constitute a violation of any other subtitle of this title.
